name: mobiledev-wechatmoments-kotlin
description: 1. Android Studio Bumblebee (2021.1.1) - via [Android Developers](https://developer.android.com/studio) 2. Android SDK 31 and BuildTools 30.0.3 - via [Android SDK Manager](https://developer.android.com/studio/intro/update#sdk-manager) 3. Java JDK 11 - via [Azul OpenJDK](https://www.azul.com/downloads/?version=java-11-lts&package=jdk) or [Oracle Java Downloads](https://www.oracle.com/java/technologies/javase/jdk11-archive-downloads.html) 4. npm - via [Node.js installer](https://nodejs.org/en/download/) or [nvm](https://github.com/nvm-sh/nvm#install--update-script)
